tool_description: Calculates overall identification confidence by weighting and combining scores from multiple identification tools and criteria.
error_messages: No scores provided: Include at least two identification scores for calculation.
Invalid score values: All scores must be numbers between 0 and 100.
Insufficient data: Need minimum of 2 different score types for reliable confidence.
usage: Input available scores from identification tools (visual_score, habitat_score, etc.). Returns weighted overall confidence calculation for species identification.

confidence_category.description: Confidence level: definitive, probable, possible, uncertain

score_weights.description: Applied weights for each input score

contributing_factors.description: Identification aspects that strengthen or weaken confidence
